text: mama kathawak ahala thiyanawa mulinma paramanu bombe athhada baluwe hitlar kiyala
piya: wiliyam fonseka

"kalladi palama pamula sindu kiwwa malu gana, sinhala sindu kiyana kirilli kiyala hitapu koti polispathi birinda gana, shanthinila fathimala gana kawi githa liyawechcha oba athin kohomada chiran jayathu kiyala ho aayurakkhaththu aawada kiyala yuddhayata aawadana githa liyawenne?"

mema sanshodhanaya ketumpath kala mohan piris mahathath janamatha wicharanayakin thorawa 2/3 bahuthara parlimenthu manthri balayen ketumpatha nithigatha kala haki bawata nigamanaya dun aga winisuru shirani bandaranayaka yana dedenama rajunge udahasata lakwi athi aakaraya desa balana wita apata sihiganwenne iparani bharathaye granthayak wana ‘pancha thanthrayayi‘ ehi sandahanwanne pamanata wada samipa asurak thaba nogatha yuthu charitha 5 k atha.

meyata athi ek udaharanayak nam batahira widyawe iganwena jala chakrayayi.(ehi wiwidha jala chakra pilibandawa kiyawenne wiya hakiya.mehi ma sandahan karanne apa samanyayen handunana jala chakrayayi)jala chakraya magin warshawa aashritha sansiddhi siyallama pahe nirupanaya kirima ha pahadili kirima kala haki yayi kiyaweyi.kese wethath ada wana wita jala chakraya wikruthi wi athayi api kiyamu.kalata welawata wasi nowatena bawath watena wasse kramanukulathwayak nathi bawath asannata labeyi.namuth ee siddhi pahadili kirima jala chakraya bhawithayen kala nohakiya.sammatha jala chakraye adangu nowana yam yam sadhaka(wananthara heli kirima aadi) wala balapama nisa ewani wikruthi athi weyi.namuth ema sadhaka pilibandawa sammathayehi adangu nowana nisama eewa pahadili kirimata batahira widyawata nohaki wi atha.min kiyawenne sansleshanaya grahanaya karaganimata batahira widyawa dakwana asamathkama nisa kalaguna widyawedi batahirayan tharamak asamath wana bawaya.
mama gaman nam, mata suwa wana bawa waidya no haki ya.
yapanaya widya dariya paharagena gos dushanaya kara ghathanaya kirime siddhiyehi waradakaruwanwu pudgalayin eeye rathriye pallekale dumbara pihiti bogambara bandhanagarayata gena enu labi ya.

milagata 1956 di ostralopithakas fosilayak naganahira aprikawata ayath tansaniyawe di meri liki wisin soyagannaladi.methan sita liki pawule aya digatama kanim sidukaragena giyoya.mehidi owunta homo habilis saha homo irektas manawa purwajakayange fosilada hamuwiya.[20] 1997 di boho durata sampurna ata sakillak dakunu aprikawe gutenghi stekfontan nam guhawe thibi yamuwiya.
ee wenas kirima kotharam mugdha lesa kara ath da yath liyawille siddhi pelagasa thibime tharkanukula sambandhayama eyin bida wati atha.
hitha matha karanawa neweyi.
awuruddakata parak labena ee dinaya mata nam sundara mathakayak.
ee, wimal wirawansha, dinesh gunawardhana, udaya gammanpila saha wasudewa nanayakkarayi.
paudgalika waidya widyala bihi wima walakiya nohakke me nisaya.

eda paudgalika anshaya sandaha yojitha wisha්rama watupata erehiwa udghoshanaya karaddi polis wedi paharin miya giya roshen chamika gana sihipath karaddi api kiwwe meya awasana ghathanaya wewa kiyala..
kalekata issara: amma kenek wima

ese nathiwa pudgalika eewa aawa gaman rajaye ewwa wahenawa wage the koppayeth kimbaulan dakina andame thiyari walata yamen wanne danatamath pirihi prathipalayak wath hariyata nikuth karagath nohaki usas adhyapana paddhathiyama rajaye deshapalana henchange wihiluwak wimaya.
api hamoma godak unanduwen yana ekama thana fesbuk eken awurudu 18ka tharunayek tharuniyakata aadare karanna patan gannawa.
aaranchi margawalata anuwa idiriyedi hawulkara wyaparayath aarambha kirimath samanga apata dakunu aasiyanu ha madaperadiga kalapayata sima wana guwan sewayak bawata pathwimata ida atha.
kiyawalama kiyannako adahasa.
